subject: System Performance Issue
description: We are experiencing slow response times in the document processing system. Users are reporting delays of 30+ seconds when uploading large PDF files. Need urgent assistance to diagnose and resolve this performance bottleneck.

subject: New Employee Onboarding Process
description: Need clarification on the digital onboarding process for new railway engineers. What documents need to be processed through the AI system vs traditional filing? Also need access permissions setup guidance.
resolution_notes: Provided comprehensive onboarding guidelines. HR team confirmed the process is clear. Employee onboarding documentation updated accordingly.

subject: Emergency Protocol Documentation Review
description: Need urgent review of emergency evacuation procedures for metro stations. Current documents are 2 years old and may not reflect recent infrastructure changes. Safety audit is pending and we need updated protocols within 48 hours.

subject: Department Portal Integration Test
description: This query demonstrates the integration between the Department Portal (port 8082) and Admin System (port 8080). Department staff can now access their own dedicated interface to raise and track queries.

subject: Budget Allocation for AI System Upgrade
description: Request for budget approval to upgrade our AI document processing system. Current system handles 100+ documents but we need enhanced performance for 500+ documents daily processing capacity.
